It's game over for humanity, The Great Filter-moment has arrived. Because of the exponential speed of technological development, I think that humanity will be completely wiped out,  by an ever more powerful and self-improving ASI, around 2050, or before. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gA1sNLL6yg4
